title: IP MAN 1,2,3,Final Fight,The Legend is Born,Grandmaster: 720p HC
description:
Description:

This COLLECTION contains ALL *Six* IP MAN films (from 2008-2015)! ALL of the movies are in the ORIGINAL Audio's (that the movies were FILMED in) and also with HARDCODED (English) Subs for those who just want to "Plug 'n Play" WITHOUT having to CONVERT anything!

This is IDEAL for folks (like me) who play EVERYTHING on their PS3's, XBOX's, and so on!

_________________________________________


Plot Synopsis:

Ip Man 1 (2008) - "The life story of Yip Man, the first person to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun."

Ip Man 2 (2010) - "In this film inspired by a true story, Wing Chun martial arts master Ip Man (Donnie Yen) and his family are moving from Foshan, China, to Hong Kong, where Ip aspires to create a school so that he may teach his fighting techniques to a new generation. However, he finds resistance from an asthmatic Hung Ga master named Hong Zhen Nan (Sammo Hung). Soon, Ip is drawn into a treacherous world of corruption as well as a fateful showdown with a merciless boxer known as the Twister (Darren Shahlavi)."

Ip Man 3 (2015) - "Martial-arts master Ip Man (Donnie Yen) takes on a crooked developer (Mike Tyson) and his gang of brutal thugs."

IP Man: The Final Fight (2013) - "Ip Man reluctantly begins a series of challenges from rival kung fu schools and is soon drawn into the dark and dangerous world of the Triads."

The Legend is Born: Ip Man (2010) - "Yip Man resists foreign invaders while learning from three Wing Chun masters."

The Grandmaster (2013) - "The story of the martial arts master (Tony Leung Chiu Wai) who taught the Wing Chun style of kung fu to Bruce Lee."

_____________________________
